name: Bomber Crew
description: Chocks away! Bomber Crew is a strategic simulation game, where picking the right crew and keeping your bomber in tip top shape is the difference between completing your mission or losing it all! USAAF DLC NOW AVAILABLE! FLY THE ICONIC AMERICAN BOMBER!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 x86/x64 Processor: Intel Core i3-530 (4 * 3000) or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 9800 GT (1024 MB) Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10  x86/x64 Processor: Intel Core i3-6300 (2*3800) or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti (1024 MB) Storage: 500 MB available space
